text: El Bayadh () is a municipality of Algeria. It is the capital of El Bayadh Province. This town was known as Géryville during the French colonization of Algeria. ==Geography== The Ksour Range is a mountainous area extending between Figuig and El Bayadh. ==References== Category:Communes of El Bayadh Province Category:Province seats of Algeria
title: El Bayadh
